category: Member Sports Group Regulations/Article 2 (Purpose and Status)
contents: Article 2 (Purpose and Status) ① Member sports organizations widely disseminate the sports of the relevant sports to the public to improve national physical strength, promote healthy use of leisure time and a cheerful spirit, and support and foster athletes and their organizations to provide excellent sports activities. The purpose is to foster athletes and contribute to enhancing national prestige. ② The member sport organization represents the Republic of Korea as the only organization in the sport that has exclusive negotiating rights with international sports organizations, such as the International Sports Federation, which has jurisdiction over the sport.
